name: Subject 001
description:
A game made entirely out of Houdini assets!

Story: You are the very first test subject that has been created. The creators have no idea what to expect from you. The creators want to collect data on how you overcome the obstacles. For what purpose?  you don't know, you are just the subject...

Hint: The key is so tackle the obstacles calmly, don't try to rush it :)

Controls:

Move: WASD

Look around: Mouse

Sprint: Left Shift

Jump: Spacebar
